name: Pixel Jumper (PixelNate159)
description:
Pixel Jumper was created as a summer project to learn Python and Pygame by PixelNate159.

The idea is to jump up the randomly generated platforms to level 200. The higher you go, the further apart the platforms become, so you will need to collect gems and purchase upgrades to be able to reach the higher platforms.

The game has a Minecraft graphics theme, with the PixelNate159 minecraft skin as the player's character.

Sourc code is available here: https://github.com/pixelnate159/PixelJumper

View PixelNate159's YouTube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFioZVfFMzIwpNH-bTb01VA
